author: Steve Schneider
description: Sherry, orgeat and cream of coconut are unlikely bedfellows, but all combine harmoniously with lime juice in this rum-laced Tiki-style cocktail.
name: Thunder In Paradise
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
22.5 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice and serve with a straw
